page.title: 14GROWING OLD
page.content: Primary P2/3L were doing a project on a "Growing Old/How Things Have Changed" theme. As part of this work a survey was carried out on the elderly people of Crieff. The children made up questionairs and then interviewed as many of the elderly population as they could. The results showed that the majority of elderly people were quite happy with facilities for them , although 40% suggested a club with musical entertainment would be a great idea. Among the hobbies an pastimes enjoyed, the most popular were; gardening, knitting, watching T.V., reading, golf, fishing, meeting other people and visiting friends. The most popular meeting places were found to be the Churchguild and Strathcare.
